summary: This mod adds 4 new spells to the game for bound armor/weapons
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 4 new spells to the game which can be purchased from Farengar in Dragonsreach. The spells include Bound Dragon Armor, Bound Dragon Armor with Sword, Bound Dragon Armor with Bow, and Bound Dragon Armor with Battleaxe.

Bound Dragon Armor summons a set of armor with the same visuals as the new Dragon Aspect shout. It increases your armor by 75 and does not unequip your current gear. At the moment it does not work with the Mage Armors perk because I\'m still trying to figure out how to do that :P

Also I plan to add some sort of \"Magey\" type enchant to the armor in the future. Leave a comment if you have any suggestion on what that enchant should be ^_^

The other 3 spells summons the Bound Dragon Armor as well as the respective bound weapon for each spell.

This mod required the Dragonborn DLC.

Please leave some comments and let me know what you guys think of the mod. :)
author: GuildedDagger
